input: I was actually interested in getting a little more money considering I would really be interested in a Team manager position.
I understand, but would at least need to work an 8 hour day considering that is the industry benchmark for a Programmer or Team Manager position.
I am willing to take a 10% pension fund instead of 20% if you can increase the salary from 60,000 USD to 90,000 USD.
I would like 90,000 USD, with a car, a 10% pension fund, fast promotion track, an 8 hour work day, and a Team Manager or Project Manager.
Actually, 60,000 USD is less than I was looking for, especially if you aren't including a company car.
I appreciate you increasing the position from programmer to Team Manager, but must insist that I would make 90,000 USD, especially with the increased responsibilities of a manger role.

I also require a rate of 90k

I accept!
I have my own car. That's not an issue as long as you can get me the Project Manager position at 120,000 USD and 20% pension. I'd like to be on the fast track and working no more than 9 hours a day.
